amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funds from the Development Assistance Fund from being granted to India or to non-governmental or private voluntary organizations operating in India.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 65 in the Congressional Record of June 22, 1995, to prohibit any funds from the Development Assistance Fund from being granted to India or to non-governmental or private voluntary organizations operating in India.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton amendment (A033) as amended Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 210 (Roll no. 446).
